label: Sinai Georgian NF M 71, Undertext (Christian Palestinian Aramaic)

note.value: Original text in two columns extends over conjoint folios. Only the top half of each original folio is preserved. Fols. 1r+8v represent the top half of the original folio in two columns. Fols. 8r+1v represent the top half of the original folio in two column

For a possible reconstruction of the sequence of this text, see Müller-Kessler 2014, pp. 263-309: 1. Syr. no. 16, fol. 108r Deut. 6:4-5a; 7b-10a    Syr. no. 16, fol. 108v Deut. 6:11b-12a; 14b-16a 2. Syr. no. 16, fol. 127r Deut. 7:25-26; Job 6:1b-4a    Syr. no. 16, fol. 127v Job 6:5b-13a 3. Syr. no. 16, fol. 109r Job 7:21b; Is. 40:1-5a    Syr. no. 16, fol. 109v Is. 40:6b-7 4. Syr. no. 16, fol. 63/68r Job 9:12b-23a    Syr. no. 16, fol. 63/68v Job 9:23b-34 5. Syr. no. 16, fol. 38/106r Deut. 13:6b-12a    Syr. no. 16, fol. 38/106v Deut. 13:12b-17a 6. Syr. no. 16, fol. 107/48r Deut. 13:17b; Job 21:1-12a    Syr. no. 16, fol. 107/48v Job 21:12b-22 7. Syr. no. 16, fol. 41/60r Prov. 9:1-9a    Syr. no. 16, fol. 41/60v Prov. 9:9b-11; Is. 40:9-12a 8. MS 35, fol. 27r Dan. 3:24b-26; 28-30b    MS 35, fol. 27v Dan. 3:32-33a; 35b-37 9. MS 35, fol. 62/63r Prov. 1:15b-19; Jer. 1:11-13a    MS 35, fol. 62/63v Jer. 1:13b-17; Ps. 26(27):7 10. Georgian NF 71, fol. 1r/8v Ex. 4:3–5:1; 3–4a    Georgian NF 71, fol. 1v/8r Ex. 5:6–7a; 6b–10
Probably belongs to Codex Sinaiticus Rescriptus (St. Petersburg/Oslo) (= Codex Sinaiticus Rescriptus (St. Petersburg b/Codex Sinaiticus Zosimi Rescriptus I) Lectionary
Description of undertext by Christa Müller-Kessler, Sebastian Brock
